title: Jamf Protect Overview
description: This is an overview of your organization's Jamf Protect telemetry, unified logs and alerts. From here you can discover insights on the system, user, application and network activity originating from your endpoints.

definition.content:
Use this dashboard to monitor your Jamf Protect telemetry, unified logs and alerts, giving you greater visibility into security-related events generated from your Jamf deployment.

Once you’ve enabled the Jamf Protect integration in your Datadog account, you’ll be able to easily search, filter, and alert on all Jamf protect events in Datadog.
Datadog analyzes Jamf Protect Telemetry log data and allows you gain insights into system and user activity related to your macOS computers and their environments.
Datadog surfaces Jamf Protect's Unified Logging and surfaces events related to your macOS endpoints.
Datadog analyzes Jamf Protect logs and surfaces insights related to network activity on your macOS computers and their environments.

Datadog Cloud SIEM surfaces Jamf Protect alerts within your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you're signed up for [Datadog Cloud SIEM](https://app.datadoghq.com/security).
